Defining spreads

Below you will find an excel template for defining the tables and instructions on how to fill in the spreadsheet.

Download template

  • templates/define_spreads.xlsx

Instruction for defining the table

chart_type year_start year_end unit countries caption notes
lineplotcntry 2002 2014 million people all RAF Rural population in 2002 and 2014 in African countries Please exclude West-Sahara
topbotdot 2014 2014 percent all RAF Rural population share in 2014, top 20 African countries Please exclude West-Sahara
